name: Bait Ball
description:
Note: the HTML5 version starts off really laggy. This lag should subside quickly, but if it doesn't or if you'd like to avoid the lag entirely, please use one of the downloads.

For Mini Jam 36, which had the theme 'nature' and enforced the restriction of <= 3 colours on the screen at any time. Submission was around 30 minutes late.

The possible grades are S > A > B > C > D > E > F. My personal bests for the shark, jellyfish and gull are D, S and B respectively.

Credits:

  • Font: Inconsolata.

Last updated ~12pm 10/09/2019 AEST.
